data.title: Hair Hunters
data.meta_description: Heir Hunters is such an interesting programme and so informative. The money is barely relevant except that Fraser and Fraser needs to get paid.
data.text:
[QUOTE=LIZALYNN;63432211That female presenter with long blonde hair looked a mess. Her hair could do with a jolly good brushing and a tidy up.[/QUOTE]

Don't you dare criticise the wonderful, absolutely stunning Lisa Faulkner. I would watch the programme even if I was blind just to hear her voice - wonderful! :D

0

I see this has been put on at a prime time slot as it use to be on in the mornings. Ratings must be up

0

Is this the actress Lisa Faulkner,with

the whiny nasal voice?????

She was rubbish back in Brookside and

later on in Holby City too.At least she is

consistent,I will say that for her!

0

Lisa Faulkner is lovely, has a great voice and is a brilliant cook (celebrity masterchef champion). What more could you want? She's also married with 2.4 children.

She was married to actor Chris Coghill with whom she has an adopted daughter, they have now separated. She is currently supposed to be seeing Masterchef's John Torode!

0
